summary: A journalism student tracks a killer with the help of her detective father and a therapist.
cast: Katheryn Winnick|Kevin Pollak|Nicholas Tucci|Bruce Dern|Richard Short|Alexi Wasser|Lenny von Dohlen|Cady Huffman|Billy Kay|Billy Magnussen|Tom Cleary|Shana Dowdeswell|John Rothman|Cathy Ladman|David Iacono|Kate Nauta|Henry Baker|James Riordan|Oliver Solomon|Jason Good|Trip Langley|Patrick Noonan|Barbara Ann Davison|Lisa McCullough|Kahan James|Annalaina Marks|Daniel Farcher|Jake Goldberg|Adrian Martinez|Michael Baldwin|Niko El Santo Zavero|Talia Balsam|Marilyn Berry|Gary Cherkassky|Elleen Hannah|Daniel Hartley|Dennis Hoerter|Klavdia Ramnareine
title: Choose
